product_name: GarnierSkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Waterproof Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGarnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Cleanser & Waterproof Makeup Remover gently cleanses skin and removes makeup, all in 1 step.
details: DetailsBenefitsMicellar Cleansing Water cleanses, removes waterproof makeup and refreshes skinMicellar lifts away dirt, oil, and makeup without harsh rubbing leaving skin clean and refreshedRemoves tough makeup even the leading wipes can't, leaves less waterproof mascara residue. Use Waterproof Micellar Cleansing Water and Reusable Eco PadsTIPS - Remove hair color stains from skin, remove dirt and oil before waxing and clean hands/excess self-tanner immediately after applicationFormulated WithoutCruelty-freeVeganFree of parabens, fragrance, and sulfatesItem 2298443How To UseShake well before use. Saturate a cotton pad with the Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water for Waterproof Makeup. To Remove Eye Makeup: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe away makeup without harsh rubbing. To Cleanse Skin & Remove Face Makeup:Gently wipe pad all over face until skin is clean and makeup and impurities are removed. Use daily. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isohexadecane, Potassium Phosphate, Sodium Chloride, Hexylene Glycol, Dipotassium Phosphate, Disodium EDTA, Decyl Glucoside, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Saturate a cotton pad with the Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water for Waterproof Makeup. To Remove Eye Makeup: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe away makeup without harsh rubbing. To Cleanse Skin & Remove Face Makeup:Gently wipe pad all over face until skin is clean and makeup and impurities are removed. Use daily. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Good makeup remover
reviews.comments: It take off a lot of makeup using just one cotton pad. I will say your face may feel oily if you dont shake the bottle, once you shake it really well, it comes off better.

reviews.headline: Came leaking
reviews.comments: Works well but packaged poorly, mine came leaking-wetting everything inside

reviews.headline: great for removing waterproof eye makeup!!!
reviews.comments: as a person whose eyes water a lot between allergies and just having sensitive eyes, I have to wear waterproof mascara. otherwise, I would have raccoon eyes and would be super embarrassed. this product is great because it helps easily take off my waterproof mascara and is cheap!

reviews.headline: My face Micellar
reviews.comments: this is the only micellar water I use, takes of Maybelline Sky High waterproof, which is very hard to remove lol

reviews.headline: Worst product ever.
reviews.comments: This is the only micellar water I've used that has made my skin feel so gross, greasy, chokingly thick, and just dirty. I followed the instructions to a tee and no amount of shaking the product helped. It didn't even remove my makeup well and it took multiple washes of my face to make it feel normal again. DO NOT BOTHER. I am returning this ASAP.

reviews.headline: 100% recommended
reviews.comments: Best product to remove water make up

reviews.headline: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING!!!Â¡
reviews.comments: I wear a decent amount of makeup and it takes it ALL off and sunscreen and dirt/oil. It also takes off all mascara that I've tried, but I don't wear waterproof mascara because it's horrible for your eyes but I've heard it takes that off to. It doesn't bother my skin and I have EXTREMELY dry and sensitive skin. It is amazing and I love both of the formulas. I would definitely recommend for everyone and especially people with sensitive and/or dry skin. I will always use this!!! GO BUY THIS PLEASE, IT WILL CHANGE YOUR SKIN!!!!

reviews.headline: Favorite Micellar Water
reviews.comments: This is the one that does the trick for me. It removes anything and doesn't feel like it just sits on my skin afterward. While I prefer to rinse my face after using, there are plenty of days that I run short on time and just use this, with no issues.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This Garnier micellar cleansing water works great and does indeed remove my waterproof mascara!  It also did a good job of removing the dirt and grime the collected on my face throughout the day.  Would highly recommend and would buy again for sure!

reviews.headline: 10's across the boards!!
reviews.comments: Made my skin feel great after using!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Just a little strong

reviews.headline: I've repurchased the 23 oz bottle maybe like 10x lol
reviews.comments:
I am Korean, so I have very straight Asian lashes that fall down with normal mascaras. I have to exclusively use Asian mascaras because nothing else will be smudge-proof and hold up my lashes all day. However, those are a PAIN to take off :( 

BUT this makeup remover (specifically the blue cap) is the only thing that can take everything off. You can't just start swiping your cotton pad immediately upon contact though - you have to hold the pad onto your stubborn makeup and let it marinate for like at least 15 seconds (I hold it on for like 20-30 for my mascara) before swiping. Let it do its magic, and it'll come off in a breeze. 

Not only do I wear super robust mascara, I also do a whole beat on my face with waterproof eyeliner and a thick full coverage foundation. This makeup remover makes taking off my thick base layer (that got solidified with powder) a breeze. I can usually get away with using 3 cotton pads to remove my whole face and removing leftover residue that doesn't get away from the first pass. It's way easier to remove makeup with this than other makeup remover wipes - the wipes usually irritate my skin by the time I'm done and also require a lot of friction while rubbing. Sometimes I will oil cleanse, but it definitely takes longer to oil cleanse than to use this haha 

Anyways, if Garnier ever discontinues this, idk what I'll do lol. I love this product MWAH

reviews.headline: This product is good!
reviews.comments: This took off mu wayerproof mascara very easily, but i was left feeling greasy where it was applied. I definitely would recommed the pink topped micellar water for non-waterproof makeup!!!!

reviews.headline: A little disappointed
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for a while now and I have recently gotten a stye in my eye from it and it doesn't take off mascara too well.

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments:
I WOULD 100% BUY THIS PRODUCT AGAINNNNN

I have used make wipes and it has felt harah on my eyes especially since I use waterproof mascara. 
WORKS LIKE A DREAM

reviews.headline: Easy Clean
reviews.comments: I love easy to use face cleaning products for a quick refresh after the gym or during the day. I found this to be effective at removing makeup, even long-lasting. It is gentle on my skin and it cleans well without drying it out. My skin was not irritated with using it and left it feeling smooth and moisturized.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This product is excellent to remove your waterproof make up I just love it

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. It takes off the grime that is left behind after you use a face swipe, and before you wash your face. I always thought the face wipes took off everything, only to find out when using this stuff it doesn'tâ€¦ there's a lot left behind. It does this all without drying your face. It does not feel like your face is going to crack after you use it.

reviews.headline: I've purchased this product numerous times!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite micellar water. It works great on waterproof mascara and lasting foundation. ðŸ’–ðŸ’–

reviews.headline: Not a fan of the oily residue
reviews.comments: I didnt like how oily my face felt after using this. I understand its a component to remove water proof makeup but i much rather perfer a cleansing oil to remove water proof makeup

media.headline: I will keep this in my arsenal at all times

faceoff_positive.comments: I've used just about every cleanser out there. I have very sensitive skin. I'm a pretty loyal Garnier customer, so when they came out with this product, I was 1st in line to try it. I've been using it since it's inception. It leaves your skin so clean without drying you out - the first time I used it, I went back over it with an astringent to see what might've been missed (like all of my other cleansers) & there wasn't a single residual amount of make-up or dirt to be found. I've been using it ever since. I use the waterproof one since my eyeliners are usually waterproof. Having had some experience in the make-up field, one bit of advice (a complaint I've seen throughout the comments) - whenever you remove your eye makeup - if the pad you are using is loaded with all the debris from your face, get a fresh one. Then, after you've saturated the pad, gently hold it on your eyelid (and lashes if you're wearing mascara) for about 10-15 seconds). This allows the cleanser to break down the compound holding those long-lasting eyeliners & mascaras in place. Then, gently wipe away. If you used eyeliner &/or mascara on your lower lash-line, use your pinky under the make-up remover pad to gently wipe under that area. You don't want to rub harshly because the skin around your eyes is the thinnest & therefore ages the fastest. This Micellar Water Works! I don't typically leave reviews, but I've had sensitive skin my entire life & I've finally found something that cleans ALL of my make-up OFF, leaving nothing behind AND, without drying my skin out. I'd hate to see anyone turn away from this product because they didn't have a bit more knowledge about how to use it. It really does work.  I wish you all the very best in your skin-care journeys & I pray that this product is never removed from the shelf. It has been my saving grace! Thank you Garnier for another great product!! Nicole in NH.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best facial cleanser I've ever used

faceoff_negative.comments:
When is a product deemed unsafe?  My daughter was unrecognizable yesterday.  She worked bc she has to but was in agonizing pain the entire time.  

She had used this face cleanser the night before.  The next morning she could not open her eyes due to agonizing pain.  They constantly burned, watered, and felt like they were sliced and diced.  This cleanser she had used gave her a severe allergic reaction.  She couldn't even drive to and from work.  I drove her.  She was very light sensitive.  Thank goodness her work accommodated her.  

Do not buy.  In fact, do your research bc there are other reviews from micellar cleansers that state they had the same reaction.  This is a common reaction to this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: My teen daughter had the worse allergic reaction.
